channel.title: Making an ingame pk point score board
channel.description:
i would like to know how to make one. i am using blue scape source.
can anyone point me in the right direction? i want to use the interface 6308 (dueling scoreboard) to show players rank, their name, combat level and their pk points i really don't mind if it is top 10 or 20 i just want something to work with.
i have used the search bar.... nothing there just website scores and issues. can anyone help me?
